replies.body:
Mana regen masteries and items is a plus, it allows you to use your dash on a group of low enemies more often and you get the easy escape.

I also try to build a Nashors tooth on some mid laners, it helps get more CS easier without using skills and pushing towers faster, but that is for mid game or later.

Just use your W, get some CDR and mana regen and use it. At 20% CDR you will have a 4.8 second CDR, you attack the minions until they are low, than W into them for easy CS and escaping.

And once you have your Ult, even rank 1 with 40 second CD, you can W into minions and R into the enemy for some poke and an escape.
nashors tooth and mana regen masteries on leblanc....the pinnacle of assassins getting attack speed and meditation over merciless....plz stahp

+80AP and 20% CDR, that is good in anyone's book.

The AS and on hit is good as it does let her be more than a one hit wonder. Lately I see LB's bitch that others are OP... 2 seconds after they can't burst them down and their AA does jack shit.

Nashor's costs way too much for just its stats since LeBlanc doesn't basic attack enough for the on-hit to be worth it. Morellonomicon is much more cost-efficient and has other stats which are beneficial (mana regen and grievous wounds). LeBlanc needs items as soon as possible so even without the mana regen and grievous wounds Morellonomicon is better.

A Leblanc lane is noooot a passive lane man, I usually try to proc Thunderlord's on my enemy as SOON as I get into lane. There are lots of ways you can trade effectively with Leblanc. Good trades = Kill Pressure. Kill Pressure = Kills/CS Advantages/Turret Damage/Roams.

I don't know how you are with her combos so I won't go into that unless you specifically ask but just remember to never stick around too hard if you're just going for a trade, you have an incredibly easy escape, don't forget to use it! And make sure you do your shit quick, so you can be in and out.

I generally do them pretty fast, im a kat main.

maybe its just matchups. i just do them whenever, sometimes its free harass, sometimes i just get outtraded and probably killed. I'm just dont really know what her limits are.

ill try procing thunderlords as soon as i get into lane though :D

Also, what are you maxing? 

Yeah you can get a really cheeky free auto right after a W if you time it right, so you auto, W/auto/W and its easy damage
I max q. Any particular matchups that should be noted ?

Maxing W is better 95% of the time. The mobility is so crucial not to mention the safest combos you can do revolve around your Distortion.

So, probably the worst matchup for you is Lissandra, when you W in, she can bind you and outtrade you, at level 6, your crazy mobility is no longer a factor since she can lock you down for close to 3 seconds. 

Other not to great matchups are Lux, Morgana and Lulu since these champions have shields and buffs to stop you from snowballing off of them, or can time their cc perfectly to catch you mid or post Distortion and burst you
